(Replace this first paragraph with a brief description of your new category. This guidance will appear in the category selection area, so try to keep it below 200 characters.)

Use the following paragraphs for a longer description, or to establish category guidelines or rules:

  • Why should people use this category? What is it for?

  • How exactly is this different than the other categories we already have?

  • What should topics in this category generally contain?

  • Do we need this category? Can we merge with another category, or subcategory?

posts.name: system
posts.cooked:
9: Whitelist Token Proposal - Accept ANTZ Token as Experimental DAO currency

It’s happened! The Peace Antz Token has been created. I will deposit the majority of them into the DAO treasury. This token is experimental so how it’s used is up to us. I think using it as a promotional give away to bring people into the DAO could be cool. You can make people feel rich by giving them 1 billion tokens.
Relevent Link: polygonscan.com/token/0xc5a2237b0f4bb6a2e15ff0299ee49ac5c9acc1c0
Applicant: 0x6015b208586db5bfb398154aadc411f46b96f485
Shares: 0
Loot: 0
Tribute Offered: 0
Payment Requested: 0
